:::The Destrocons/Falcon/Snare:::

Skywarp: What? Magmatron has returned?
Ramjet: He's back sooner than i thought.  Well, i hope hes proud of the work 
i've done.
Dirge: Aren't you just a little bit disappointed that your reign as leader of 
the Destrons is already over?
Ramjet: Oh, come on Dirge, we all agreed that i was only the acting leader, 
you know that.
Skywarp: We'd better inform the others.
::Ramjet opens his comm to the others::
Ramjet: Attention Destrons,  seems that Magmatron has returned.  We are 
headed to the Sulaco, please meet us there.
::The Destrocons start flying to the Sulaco::
~~~~~
::Falcon and Snare hear Ramjet's transmission and start flying to the Sulaco::


--part1_c0.131a0056.2814eea2_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
